main.top_subtitle: Here your everyday tasks are solved
main.top_text: The team of the «HouseHub» Home Service Agency will be useful if you are actively looking for a job in the field of home services or you are a business representative who wants to solve issues related to staffing or personnel management.
main.client_subtitle: We find the best employees to meet your needs
main.worker_subtitle: We help to find a job
main.worker_item1: free registration in the agency database
main.worker_item2: we care about mutually beneficial terms of cooperation with the customer
main.worker_item3: ensure security and compliance with agreements
main.business_item2: Chef for the head of the company
main.bottom_text: The accumulated knowledge and experience allow the specialists of the «HouseHub» Home Service Agency not only to professionally select, but also to help our clients in organizing and managing their households, regardless of their location:
main.bottom_item1: Consultations and coaching on domestic staff management for clients
main.bottom_item2: Planning and optimization of the staff of domestic workers (possibly both online and on-site)
main.bottom_item3: Development of a package of documents as tools for managing domestic staff (policies, contracts, job profiles)
main.bottom_item5: On-site master classes from professionals: on organizing home catering; on organizing and equipping dressing rooms, maintaining a VIP wardrobe; on organizing gardening and park work.
main.bottom_about: Our team offers professional development for employees by organizing courses and also advises clients on the management of home assistants. You can always find useful information on the website. HouseHub Home Service Agency is focused on promising long-term relationships with clients and values their trust. The Agency's specialists always strive to be of service to you.
main.end_item2: Member of the Association of Domestic Staff Agencies
main.end_business_text: Choose from our scheduled or on-site programs. Expert trainers, personalized content.
main.end_staff_text: Join our scheduled courses to improve your abilities.Maximum amount of relevant and high-quality information in a short time. Certificate at the end of the course.
